ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:

<4> Battery Charger for NP-BX1 + <5> Zeikos 50" Compact Tripod + <6> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash +
<7> PD-C20 Camera/Camcorder Case + <8> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <9> PD 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<10> LCD Screen Protectors + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> Image Recovery Software
